family_id.Description: Family identifier (participants belonging to the same family share a family_id)

age.Description: Age (in years, rounded down) at session 1

age_ses02.Description: Age (in years, rounded down) at session 2

sex.Description: Sex of the participant as reported by the participant

handedness.Description: Handedness of the participant as reported by the participant

Levels.1b: TSE increase in the number of volumes (50 to 55) to improve hippocampus coverage
Levels.1c: TSE increase in the number of volumes (55 to 60) to improve amygdala coverage

Levels.2b: Emotional conflict task increase in the number of volumes (830 to 837)
